5498819e-1f6b-41cf-a7e4-6a764ffeb4df.name: Easy to hit
5498819e-1f6b-41cf-a7e4-6a764ffeb4df.notes: Others can target your eyes at -6

bcb7c53b-ffc4-4e42-a4ec-7287bcdaa5e6.name: Arm ST
bcb7c53b-ffc4-4e42-a4ec-7287bcdaa5e6.notes: +2 ST when using arms for attacking

615377df-1f5b-4079-a700-6506650a3691.name: Armor Familiarity (@Skill@)
615377df-1f5b-4079-a700-6506650a3691.notes: Let you ignore one encumbrance level

06c3956f-c0d1-4f02-b265-1c87ea422854.name: Frequency: Constantly
06c3956f-c0d1-4f02-b265-1c87ea422854.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

f9c6ad3e-8632-4f41-9147-b86c5cf21738.name: Frequency: Hourly
f9c6ad3e-8632-4f41-9147-b86c5cf21738.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

58a78f2c-b6d2-4d35-9ea9-ebfa38fc74ef.name: Frequency: Daily
58a78f2c-b6d2-4d35-9ea9-ebfa38fc74ef.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

e6fc0587-f1c2-40b6-b3f6-048d12d2b595.name: Frequency: Weekly
e6fc0587-f1c2-40b6-b3f6-048d12d2b595.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

c4219c9a-95c7-4ac7-9cda-cfb0c573137a.name: Frequency: Monthly
c4219c9a-95c7-4ac7-9cda-cfb0c573137a.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

795c0b61-5017-4032-8b73-c94d95af458d.name: Frequency: Seasonally
795c0b61-5017-4032-8b73-c94d95af458d.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

f0bbd96c-32cf-46f2-81a4-e30b7d588a63.name: Frequency: Yearly
f0bbd96c-32cf-46f2-81a4-e30b7d588a63.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

ee38688b-e74a-413f-a389-a9ae91dc6d9d.name: Aging
ee38688b-e74a-413f-a389-a9ae91dc6d9d.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

56288029-5ce6-44db-b1ab-3d394943fd12.name: Enhanced Parry (@Melee weapon skill Or Unarmed@)

1444e652-5987-49f8-8ae3-e0fc56b47e39.name: Enhanced Time Sense
1444e652-5987-49f8-8ae3-e0fc56b47e39.notes: You immediately act in combat before those without Enhanced Time Sense; Never freeze

0772003d-3bfd-4d8e-8bb5-5a7ab7891742.name: @3 or 4@
0772003d-3bfd-4d8e-8bb5-5a7ab7891742.notes: Losing one leg halves Move; losing two means falling; Round reduced Move down

096491f5-0708-42cb-8f96-1fd5dfba2474.name: @5 or 6@
096491f5-0708-42cb-8f96-1fd5dfba2474.notes: Each leg lost reduces Move by 20% until three legs are left, at which point Move is 40% normal; losing another leg means falling; Round reduced Move down

7e888be5-ebbd-48db-9902-850823499886.notes: Each leg lost reduces Move by 10% until three legs are left, at which point Move is 40% normal; losing another leg means falling; Round reduced Move down

3356de16-9b79-4d81-bbdd-7871d9d2d617.name: Fit
3356de16-9b79-4d81-bbdd-7871d9d2d617.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

ee6e2417-29b7-46f8-a376-05f9b82d0df6.name: Fit, Very
ee6e2417-29b7-46f8-a376-05f9b82d0df6.notes: Recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

4a06a269-9e81-4e39-a369-e06f878ca1eb.name: Heroic Archer
4a06a269-9e81-4e39-a369-e06f878ca1eb.notes: Reduce arrow ready time by one round with roll/penalty and Acc bonus without aiming or ignore bulk

61bc4b0f-8ca3-4c97-8c07-24d92b487f94.name: High Pain Threshold
61bc4b0f-8ca3-4c97-8c07-24d92b487f94.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

6fe3c158-9356-491e-ac6d-bee8ca1c81ad.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

579970c2-9f7b-4332-8534-5ed4f67978c1.name: Intolerance (@Class, Ethnicity, Nationality, Religion, Sex, or Species@)

7ecf1103-1b17-469c-8f57-783a25f78dae.name: Luck
7ecf1103-1b17-469c-8f57-783a25f78dae.notes: Usable once per hour of play

37ea10fb-4476-4c7a-b99a-38e6d34a1bf5.name: Luck, Extraordinary
37ea10fb-4476-4c7a-b99a-38e6d34a1bf5.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

57f33dba-b72c-4f3e-8610-d4af074279b8.name: Luck, Ridiculous
57f33dba-b72c-4f3e-8610-d4af074279b8.notes: Usable once per 10 minutes of play

9c1caf1c-e79b-411d-a2df-43388e4b1cfb.name: Peripheral Vision
9c1caf1c-e79b-411d-a2df-43388e4b1cfb.notes: Defend at no penalty from attacks to your left or right hex. Defend at only -2 from behind.

2d4260b1-9b18-4e11-b2fc-88cb27a6376a.name: Social Stigma (Excommunicated)
2d4260b1-9b18-4e11-b2fc-88cb27a6376a.notes: You may not be a cleric

08454f25-9289-4cc8-a322-a4ffd760a9a6.name: Social Stigma (Savage)
08454f25-9289-4cc8-a322-a4ffd760a9a6.notes: 6 or less chance on 3d to be denied entry to town

3897b46e-dc6b-440a-8d08-81ae7fba2d60.name: Subsonic Hearing
3897b46e-dc6b-440a-8d08-81ae7fba2d60.notes: Ignores the Hush and Mage Stealth spells; Ineffective against those using the Light Tread spell or Light Walk skill
